lenders.loan_because: when making a differnce is this simple, there isn't an excuse.

lenders.name: Jerlena
lenders.loan_because: A small amount of money to me makes an incredible difference in the lives of so many. We are all connected, thus responsible for each other.  It is I who is transformed.
lenders.occupational_info: Higher education (university) administrator in student services and a graduate student completing a PhD at the University of California, Berkeley.

lenders.name: Kelvyn Stevens
lenders.loan_because: I worked on Aid projects in the Pacific Islands for many years. I am retired now but would like to continue helping in a small way  by financing some developement projects through the wonderful opportunity provided by KIVA.
lenders.occupational_info: I have had a lifetime of working in agriculture/horticulture and believe it is essential to develope this industry as the first step in an emerging economy  if you want to raise the living standards of the people.

lenders.name: Uli
lenders.loan_because: everyone needs a helping hand at some point in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I spend my work days in an office working on a computer.

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are helping themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a medical doctor who works for a large hospital.  My job is to help regulate the way medical care is delivered and improve the quality of care.  I also treat some patients as a volunteer physician in a free clinic for people who can't afford to pay for care.  My wife is a private tutor who helps children learn and improve their school grades.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because:
I loan because I can.  We live in a world dominated by fear of the unknown - and we act out of that fear.  

I believe that what we think and do expands exponentially in the Universe.  

What energy do YOU want to put out there?
lenders.occupational_info: I strive to find beauty in objects and things  through a lens.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of small entrepreneurs to build thriving economies.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a production craft studio that makes and sells articles of leather, entirely hand-crafted.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: Everyone can use a helping hand.  This program is great because it helps people out of poverty  for the long-term, not just a temporary fix.
lenders.occupational_info: Right now, just studying, but graduating this year, hopefully going to become an entrepreneur.

lenders.name: Mussadiq
lenders.loan_because: Giving to those in need is the most rewarding experience one can take with them. Reach out and experience it!

lenders.name: Landry Butler
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other artists.

lenders.name: Timothy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are less fortunate then I am and also want to help who are going into the Culinary Industry.
lenders.occupational_info: I make and bake pies, cakes, breads, and much more!
